abstract: Bank of America employees heading down to corporate headquarters in Charlotte, N.C., will soon have a more luxurious place to lay their heads: the bank’s very own Ritz-Carlton hotel.

lead_paragraph: Bank of America employees heading down to corporate headquarters in Charlotte, N.C., will soon have a more luxurious place to lay their heads: the bank’s very own Ritz-Carlton hotel.

headline.main: Putting On the Ritz at Bank of America
